alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Monroe County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palmer, or 10 miles southwest of Marvell, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palmer... Ragtown... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Louisiana Purchase State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
